sentences.en: A polar bear has a preference for cold weather.
sentences.cn: 北极熊喜欢寒冷的天气.

sentences.en: Alaska still is a land of iceberg and polar bear.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加现在仍是冰山和北极熊的世界.

sentences.en: As our climate warms up, the polar ice caps will begin to melt.
sentences.cn: 随着地球气候逐渐变暖，极地的冰冠将开始融化。

sentences.en: In many ways, Brett and Bernard are polar opposites.
sentences.cn: 在许多方面，布雷特和伯纳德截然不同。

sentences.en: It's very cold in the polar regions.
sentences.cn: 南北极地带是很寒冷的.

sentences.en: Love and hatred are polar feelings.
sentences.cn: 爱与恨是完全相反的感情.

sentences.en: polar bears, denizens of the frozen north
sentences.cn: 北极熊，在冰天雪地的北方生活的动物

sentences.en: Stratification in polar waters normally is weak and transient.
sentences.cn: 极地水域的成层性是微弱而暂时的.

sentences.en: The Arctic remains the domain of the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 北极仍是北极熊的领地.

sentences.en: The ivory gull often follows polar bears to feed on the remains of seal kills.
sentences.cn: 象牙海鸥经常跟在北极熊的后面吃剩下的海豹尸体.

sentences.en: The northern and southern polar regions are different in many ways.
sentences.cn: 南北极极地在许多方面均有所不同.

sentences.en: The parents' position is often the polar opposite of the child's.
sentences.cn: 父母的观点常与孩子的完全相反。

sentences.en: The polar region is the habitat of the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 北极地带为北极熊的栖息地.

sentences.en: The white fur of the polar bear is a natural camouflage.
sentences.cn: 北极熊身上的白色的浓密软毛是一种天然的伪装.

sentences.en: This image shows part of a polar crater that still holds on to some summer ice, as well as beautiful sand dunes sculpted by the wind.
sentences.cn: 这张照片展示了某个极地陨坑，陨坑中还保存着一些夏季冰的痕迹，在风的作用下形成了一些美丽的沙丘。

sentences.en: Warmth melted some of the polar ice.
sentences.cn: 温暖的天气融化了一些极地的冰雪。

sentences.en: We carry out a transformation to spherical polar coordinates.
Well, what is the equation of this circle in polar coordinates?
sentences.cn: 那么，这个圆方程在极坐标系下相当于什么呢？

sentences.en: Yet, while not wanting to begrudge the polar bear his ice, we should be at least somewhat concerned at this recent shift in thinking.
sentences.cn: 然而，虽然我们并不想希望北极熊失去它的冰，我们至少应该对近期的这些意识上的转变有一点担心。
